description:
Have you heard of this Polars thing? How is it different from Pandas? Do
you want to check it out?

In this workshop you will get exposed to Polars with a real-world
dataset.

You will see:

-  Common operations
-  Differences with Pandas
-  How to speed up your data pipeline
-  Feature gaps that you might miss coming from Pandas

You will be provided with a notebook and labs to explore Polars.
title: Getting Started with Polars
